REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2048 reute d f BC-SYNERCOM-<SYNR.O>-NAM 06-01 0042

TEXT.TITLE: SYNERCOM <SYNR.O> NAMES NEW PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Synercom Technology Inc said it has named Robert Forsyth president. The company said Forsyth is taking over the position from Thomas Moore, who remains chairman and chief executive officer. Reuter
